content: I think we feel very comfortable, though, that in the next 2 years, there'll either be in a moment in time where all parties, the lenders and the company, company being Bally's, decide that it makes sense to reengage and cut a deal on their current credit facility; or we feel comfortable that the parties and Bally's effectively needs to recut a brand-new credit facility, in which case, they'll then make sure that they remove the language and will accommodate us acquiring the assets.
